findings.title: Unencrypted Private Data On-Chain
findings.description: Private data is stored unencrypted on-chain, potentially exposing sensitive information.

findings.title: Presence of unused variables
findings.description: Unused variables are present in the contract.

findings.title: Right-To Left Override control character (U+202E)
findings.description: The Right-To-Left Override control character (U+202E) can be used to manipulate the visual representation of text, potentially leading to phishing attacks or other security issues.

findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Write to Arbitrary Storage Location
findings.description: The smart contract allows writing to arbitrary storage locations, which can lead to unauthorized data modification or manipulation.

findings.title: Requirement Violation
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Lack of Proper Signature Verification
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Missing Protection against Signature Replay Attacks
findings.description: The contract lacks protection against signature replay attacks, which can lead to unauthorized access and manipulation of the contract's state.

findings.title: Weak Sources of Randomness from Chain Attributes
findings.description: Using chain attributes as a source of randomness can be predictable and exploitable.

findings.title: Shadowing State Variables
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Incorrect Constructor Name
findings.description: The constructor name does not match the contract name.

findings.title: Signature Malleability
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Block values as a proxy for time
findings.description: Using block values (e.g., block.number or block.timestamp) as a proxy for time can be insecure because they are controlled by miners and can be manipulated.

findings.title: Authorization through tx.origin
findings.description: The contract uses tx.origin for authorization which can lead to vulnerabilities as it can be manipulated by attackers.

findings.title: Transaction Order Dependence
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: DoS with Failed Call
findings.description: A DoS attack can occur due to a failed call.

findings.title: Delegate call to Untrusted Callee
findings.description: A delegate call is made to an untrusted callee, which can lead to unauthorized access and manipulation of the contract's state.

findings.title: Use of Deprecated Solidity Functions
findings.description: The contract uses deprecated solidity functions which can lead to unexpected behavior and security vulnerabilities.

findings.title: Assert Violation
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Uninitialized Storage Pointer
findings.description: The storage pointer has not been initialized before it was used.

findings.title: State Variable Default Visibility
findings.description: State variables have default visibility.

findings.title: Reentrancy
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Unprotected SELFDESTRUCT Instruction
findings.description: The contract contains an unprotected SELFDESTRUCT instruction which can lead to unintended destruction of the contract.

findings.title: Unprotected Ether Withdrawal
findings.description: The smart contract contains an unprotected ether withdrawal vulnerability.

findings.title: Unchecked Call Return Value
findings.description: The return value of a call instruction is not checked.

findings.title: Floating Pragma
findings.description: A floating pragma is set (SWC-103)

findings.title: Outdated Compiler Version
findings.description: The smart contract uses an outdated compiler version.

findings.title: Integer Overflow and Underflow
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Function Default Visibility
findings.description: Functions with default visibility can lead to unintended access and manipulation of contract state.

findings.title: Owner cannot mint after initial deployment
findings.description: The owner of the contract loses the ability to mint new tokens after the initial deployment.

findings.title: Owner cannot burn
findings.description: The owner of the contract does not have the capability to burn tokens or assets.

findings.title: Owner cannot block users
findings.description: The owner of the contract does not have the capability to block users.

findings.title: Owner cannot pause contract
findings.description: The owner of the contract does not have the ability to pause the contract.
